channel.title: Renaming Client Project
channel.description:
Like anything else this project of mine will probably fail but there are two reasons why I am doing this.
1) To learn more about the client overall 2) To rename the client so where even a noob can even find stuff...it gets irritating having to learn what every single little method is/does.
I will be using the client from the Camelot release as that's the one I have been using for my personal use recently.
All credits will stay to the respectful developers who worked extremely hard on the client files and this is merely for understanding what each method does. Feel free to consider this a "reference guide" as there will be no download link but a listing of what each method does.
[hr]
I will be adding methods starting tonight after I get back from graduation.
[b]Method 443[/b]
Located in:
Use:
[b]Method 532[/b]
Located in: -Animable -Model -WorldController
Use: -Model textures -Animated Models -Object/Model interactions
